author: Sunae Thomas
comment: Love, love, love this app so far. It helps me keep up with my clients and prospects in a timely fashion and with ministry outreach. It's great to be able to see when last I contacted someone and even the content of that interaction. It does not seem to update when I call out from the app but that's not major. This is the first real review I've written for any app.

author: Richard Vo
comment: It was great when it started out years ago, years later until now, it is definitely still the best!

author: Kristin Landry
comment: If I could add contacts directly, not just import them, this would be the perfect app.
title: Needs one more thing

author: Kiril Garkov
comment: Of course, could be further improved and developped.
title: I've beeing looking for such app for years

author: Pankaj Sharma
comment: It is a great app. Can be improved with unlimited customized categories such as relatives,  friends, etc
title: Great app

author: MOHAMED ABURAWI
comment: Great app, and it's something iv been really looking for. I think the user interface needs to be more professional looking ...

author: Jeff Eberle
comment: Did a factory reset after backing up Comtrack.  Restore went smoothly as soon as I placed the file where the appear could retrieve it.  No hassels!  Even contacts that are no longer in my address book after the format, have stayed and kept the 2 years of history in Comtrack.
title: Back up and restore works great

author: Robert Laporte
comment: Easy to set up and ready to use
title: Most of what we need

author: Rob Hunter
comment: I'd love to see this app get some love in the "interaction design"/"user experience" department. A bit of polish - even without adding any functionality - could make this amazing.
title: Great idea, OK execution

author: Peter Taekema
comment: Just what I was looking for.  Does the job it is intended for very well.
title: Great little App.

author: Yusif Sheka
comment: Its nice good  samsung mega
title: Yes

author: Mark Lewis
comment: 8.31.13  - Thanks for update  but it doesn't help. I can't test it. Not paying for something that 'might' work. Set this up so I can access my Google contact GROUPS, from an android phone, with an android app, so I can track my contacts and test it first. Limit the contacts from a specific to ten if you must. If this passes the test I'd pay for it but not until then.  Older: Need to import only specific groups and generate report for contacts made. The visual analysis is good but I need hard copies. Thanks!

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hi! Contact history can now be exported in CSV format (premium version). Best regards.

title: Good but not enough

author: Lukas Steinmann
comment: Some contacts would just not add to the list of people to be tracked! Really anoying! And as I cannot track all the people I would like the app starts being useless. As said, great idea but needs bug fixing! And pls add tracking of whatsapp. That is a must!
title: Great idea, bad realization

author: michael Savarese
comment: I have been looking for an app like this for a while and am quite happy with it.
title: Great way to stay in touch

author: A Google User
comment: I like this

author: Arti Sharma
comment: R
title: Games

author: Rachel S
comment: I went through several apps before finding this one, it does exactly what I need. I can't speak for all the features, as I haven't tried them all. But what i have used works well
title: Just what I was looking for...

author: A Google User
comment: Does not track calls good on the Samsung Note II
title: Contact Not Tracked

author: Connie Jaramillo
comment: Cool
title: Ya

author: A Google User
comment: Need to buy Licensed to remove the ads..
title: Need to buy Licensed

author: A Google User
comment: I lost this app on my phone was exploring the option. Without my knowledge it sent a confirmation to some crap site and I lost Rs. 100. Idiotic app, don't download it. I would give -5rating for this
title: Very irritating ads I lost my money

author: A Google User
comment: Won't import my contacts and when i load them manually it still says no contacts added. Very annoying.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hello. Please contact us by e-mail if you still have problems importing contacts. Best regards.

title: Would probably be good if it worked..

author: A Google User
comment: Live the concept but doesn't update call history, which is critical to the base function. Developer responded to concern but failed to follow through.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hello. Call history update has been improved in latest versions. Please contact us by e-mail if you still have problems. Best regards.

title: Great idea, poor execution

author: A Google User
comment: Nice
title: Not bad

author: A Google User
comment: Import wiped my contact list on Thunderbolt. Buggy and not functioning correctly.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hello. The app never removes contacts from the phonebook. Please contact us by e-mail for clarifications. Best regards.

comment: Works great and is very helpful little app
